critique: The document describes a temporary withdrawal of lands from settlement, location, sale, or entry, pending completion of survey and filing of maps showing right-of-way for a transmission line to convey power from the Boulder Canyon Project to the city of Los Angeles. This suggests a moderate level of government intervention in economic regulation and potentially federal control over land use. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power, security vs. liberty, or social inclusion.
